name: annatebitherapeutics.github.io
description: If you are a webdesigner interested in Jekyll, the static website generator, this little newsletter is for you. I share tutorials, clever code snippets and information about my own Jekyll Themes called [*Feeling Responsive*][7] and [*Simplicity*][8]. Please don't expect weekly emails :)

scripts.test: npm run build && npx playwright test
scripts.test:update: npm run build && npx playwright test --update-snapshots
